msContents.summary: Unrelated fragments(3) account: list of names and amounts of money

supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-15 (in mm), (1) 40 x 54, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (2) 65 x 31, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no margins, (3) 74 x 31, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (4) 84 x 41, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 8 lines, (5) 63 x 17, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 62 x 78, (A) 4 lines, left bottom margin, (B) blank, (7) 45 x 26, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 31 x 25, (A) 1 line, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 12 x 17, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 20 x 11, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, (11) 56 x 34, (A) 6 lines, bottom margin (?), (B) 3 lines, top bottom margins, (12) 50 x 73, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (13) 73 x 70, (A) 10 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (14) 93 x 12, (A) 6 lines, bottom margin, (B) 8 lines, no margins, (15) 113 x 13, (A) 9 lines, no margins (?)

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
